attributes.action: get all ministers to have a lie detector test on all questions related to problems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ministers should be tested like the unemployed
so they cannot hide things that will cost the country money if ministers hide problems it will take more money out of the system then someone who is unemployed who lies so if unemployed are to be tested so should ministers

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
